intro.subject: You have a new message!
intro.message: OMG! I just knocked my smoothie over and its contents have spilled all over my keyboard. Do you like Shel Silverstein? A Light in the Attic changed my life. You just look like someone who would be a fan. The little man who runs my brain has taken over and I just had to send you a note.

responses.response: Do you drink a lot of smoothies? What's your favorite?
I love Uncle Shelby! What else are you into?
I love attics! Why would you want the lights on though?

smoothies.subject: [character] replied to your message
smoothies.message: Oh yeah! I'm a total health nut. I make one after every morning run. My favorite is kale and carrots with a little nutmeg.

responses.response: I'm more of a fruit smoothie kind of person.
